name: LifeMare
description:
Submission of Feel Good Incorporation for the Ludume Dare 44. We were two working on the project.

Have fun !

The game is a top-down shooter with a particularity, your health point become money at the end of every room.

With this money, you can buy upgrades for survive longer and kill all these bosses.

PS : 4 Leaf and Life Potion are usefull at the beginning
